About
Bilder Inc.

Bilder Inc. is a concept I developed in the course of my Bachelors Thesis.

This thesis was the final project for my industrial design program at Hochschule M√ºnchen.
git status

About me

My name is Manuel Lippmann. I am a designer, photographer and tinkerer based in munich.

Thanks for checking out my work! Contact me if you want to have a chat or ask me something:

Why

The state of personal photography today is in an interesting situation: technology has evolved rapidly in the last two decades.

But still personal photo collections tend to be rather cluttered, which makes it complicated to find and access our photos.

This is really sad, because there are so many memories getting lost in digital and physical space.

What

I wanted to give personal photography a new home, a space that lives up to the value our photos have to us.

This space mainly focuses on a centralised storage for all your photos. Furthermore it promotes the actual consumption of the images, to bring people back to all those good moments they had in their lifes.

And of course, in todays connected society, it elevates the sharing of photos with your friends and family.

How

Bilder Inc. is the ecosystem for personal photos.

BilderBox is the central space for your photos as well as the Bilder system: it houses all companion devices as well as powerful hardware to run advanced software functionalities.

BilderAI automatically sorts and organizes your photo library. BilderApps make your photo collection accessible anywhere, on all major plattforms.

BilderBook allows you to flip through your memories just like it used to be in the good old times.

BilderBeam provides a large canvas to view photos in a picture night with your friends and loved ones.

BilderScan is a super fast and easy way to bring your paper photos into the digital space. Quickly scan prints or negatives with the dedicated scanner units.

How Bilder Inc. solves 3 big problems of personal photography today

Eliminate clutter
Many photo libraries are distributed among different types of media: on phones, computers, harddrives or event prints. Specific photos aren‚Äôt found quickly this way. The centralised nature of BilderBox helps with this.
Bring photos back to life
More and more photos are taken every day. Yet we tend to not look at them very often. BilderBook and BilderBeam promote the consumation of your memories: enjoy personalised photo curations!
Secure
& Private
Photos are very private memories. We at Bilder Inc. belive that you should be in control of your privacy. The Bilder system never loads any data to the cloud. All photos stay local in your BilderBox. Same thing for our AI-Software.

Research

Some selected results of my research I have done for this project. First I conducted an online survey about personal photography with a total of 115 participants. Secondly I interviewed 18 persons from different age groups, cultures and genders about this topic.

The graphs shown here are an aggregation of this data.

How often do you share snapshots with friends and family?
What do you think of automated image collections curated by AI?
Whats your favourite way to view your photos?
Do you still have photos on paper or as negatives?
How important are photos on paper for you?
What do you think of automated image collections curated by AI?
